perturbation.original_text:
SECTION FOUR. REMUNERATION
 
C.
A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni
Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter
beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis
thereafter for the term of this Agreement. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the term of this
Agreement:
perturbation.changed_text:
SECTION FOUR. REMUNERATION
 
C.
A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni
Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter
beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter on an annual basis thereafter for the term of this Agreement. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the term of this
Agreement:
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that donated amounts will be dispersed on a quarterly basis, while the modified text states they will be dispersed annually. This creates a direct contradiction regarding the frequency of donation disbursements, leading to potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: The parties have executed this Agreement on November 22nd, 2017.
perturbation.changed_text: The parties have executed this Agreement on December 1st, 2017.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates a contradiction regarding the execution date of the agreement. This could lead to disputes about the effective date of the contract and the validity of actions taken before one of the two dates.

perturbation.original_text:
A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni
Northern California Chapter.
perturbation.changed_text:
A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni
Northern California Chapter, except for sales to distributors, on which the donation is $0.02 per unit.
perturbation.explanation: This modification introduces an exception to the per-unit donation amount for sales to distributors. This creates an inconsistency because the original clause states a flat rate for all licensed products and doesn't clarify how to interpret this discrepancy, causing potential disputes.
